20101221040523.000|20101221040525.000|CC1|THIS MINIMUM TRUCK HAD A

20101221040539.000|20101221040540.000|CC1|BECAUSE THE BRANCH PIERCED

20101221040541.000|20101221040543.000|CC1|IF THERE WAS A PASSENGER

20101221040603.000|20101221040606.000|CC1|ON TO THEIR NEXT CALL AND

20101221040608.000|20101221040609.000|CC1|THIS, BUT AGAIN, THIS WAS       
20101221040609.000|20101221040611.000|CC1|THE MOST DAMAGE WE'VE SEEN

20101221040613.000|20101221040614.000|CC1|THIS FRONT WINDOW SHIELD AND

20101221040626.000|20101221040626.000|CC1|>> THANKS.                      
20101221040626.000|20101221040628.000|CC1|A VIVID REMINDER YOU SHOULD     
20101221040628.000|20101221040631.000|CC1|NOT TRY TO TRY THROUGH

20101221045623.000|20101221045623.000|CC1|HER HOUSE.                      
20101221045623.000|20101221045625.000|CC1|THAT IS STILL AHEAD.            
20101221045625.000|20101221045627.000|CC1|>> AN AWARD LONG OVERDUE,
